Package backend.tradesystem.managers

Class TradingManager

java.lang.Object
backend.tradesystem.general_managers.Manager
backend.tradesystem.trader_managers.TradingManager
public class TradingManager
extends Manager
Used for trading

  • Constructor Details

    • TradingManager

      public TradingManager() throws java.io.IOException
      Initialize the objects to get items from databases
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if something goes wrong with getting database

    • TradingManager

      public TradingManager​(java.lang.String userFilePath, java.lang.String tradableItemFilePath, java.lang.String tradeFilePath) throws java.io.IOException
      Making the database objects with set file paths
      Parameters:
      userFilePath - the user database file path
      tradableItemFilePath - the tradable item database file path
      tradeFilePath - the trade database file path
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - issues with getting the file path

  • Method Details

    • requestTrade

      public Trade requestTrade​(Trade trade) throws UserNotFoundException, AuthorizationException, CannotTradeException
      Adds a new trade to the system and acknowledges that it is a requested trade between two users in the trade. A trade is a borrow if the the item the first user is offering is "". A trade is a lend if the item the second user is offering is "".
      Parameters:
      trade - the trade that is to be added to the traders.
      Returns:
      the trade object
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException - the user that wants to be traded with doesn't exist
      AuthorizationException - the item for trading cannot be traded
      CannotTradeException - cannot request a trade

    • denyTrade

      public void denyTrade​(java.lang.String tradeId) throws TradeNotFoundException, AuthorizationException, UserNotFoundException
      For denying a requested trade
      Parameters:
      tradeId - trade id
      Throws:
      TradeNotFoundException - if the trade id wasn't found
      AuthorizationException - if the trade doesn't belong to this user
      UserNotFoundException - if the traders in the trade weren't found

    • acceptRequest

      public boolean acceptRequest​(java.lang.String traderId, java.lang.String tradeId) throws TradeNotFoundException, AuthorizationException, UserNotFoundException, CannotTradeException
      For accepting a trade request
      Parameters:
      traderId - the trader confirming the meeting
      tradeId - the trade id
      Returns:
      if the request was confirmed
      Throws:
      TradeNotFoundException - if the trade wasn't found
      AuthorizationException - if the user is not a trader
      UserNotFoundException - if the user doesn't exist
      CannotTradeException - if trading limitations prevent the trade from happening

    • confirmMeetingGeneral

      public void confirmMeetingGeneral​(java.lang.String traderId, java.lang.String tradeId, boolean status) throws TradeNotFoundException, AuthorizationException, UserNotFoundException, CannotTradeException
      Confirms either the first or second meeting depending on which one is not confirmed. This method makes sure that the user can only confirm a second meeting once both traders have confirmed the first.
      Parameters:
      traderId - the trader confirming the meeting
      tradeId - id of the trade
      status - if the meeting is confirmed and the trade happened
      Throws:
      TradeNotFoundException - trade wasn't found
      AuthorizationException - this trade doesn't belong to this user
      UserNotFoundException - if the other user of the trade is not found
      CannotTradeException - can't trade

    • counterTradeOffer

      public Trade counterTradeOffer​(java.lang.String traderId, java.lang.String tradeId, java.util.Date meetingTime, java.util.Date secondMeetingTime, java.lang.String meetingLocation, java.lang.String thisTraderOffer, java.lang.String thatTraderOffer) throws CannotTradeException, TradeNotFoundException, AuthorizationException, UserNotFoundException
      Sending a counter offer
      Parameters:
      traderId - the trader id
      tradeId - the trade id
      meetingTime - the new time of the trade
      secondMeetingTime - the second meeting time of the trade
      meetingLocation - the meeting location of the trade
      thisTraderOffer - the tradable item id that the current trader is offering
      thatTraderOffer - the tradable item id that the current trader wants from the other trader
      Returns:
      the id of the trade
      Throws:
      CannotTradeException - too many edits
      TradeNotFoundException - this trade doesn't exist
      AuthorizationException - this trade doesn't belong to this user
      UserNotFoundException - user wasn't found

    • rescindTradeRequest

      public void rescindTradeRequest​(java.lang.String tradeID) throws TradeNotFoundException, UserNotFoundException, AuthorizationException
      Cancels a trade request
      Parameters:
      tradeID - The id of the trade request
      Throws:
      TradeNotFoundException - trade doesn't exist in the user's requested trades
      UserNotFoundException - the trader(s) can not be found
      AuthorizationException - couldn't find a trader type associated with the trade

    • rescindOngoingTrade

      public void rescindOngoingTrade​(java.lang.String tradeID) throws TradeNotFoundException, UserNotFoundException, AuthorizationException, CannotTradeException
      If the first meeting of a trade is not accepted yet, the trade can still be cancelled This method only should be used carefully since rescinding an ongoing trade after the real life trade has happened has dire consequences (scamming is able to happen)
      Parameters:
      tradeID - the id of the trade to undo
      Throws:
      TradeNotFoundException - trade doesn't exist in the user's accepted trades
      UserNotFoundException - the trader(s) can not be found
      AuthorizationException - couldn't find a trader type associated with the trade
      CannotTradeException - cannot complete this request because the trade could not be reversed
